Haeri Kim

About Me

I am presently working for Samsung Research as a speech AI researcher. My main research topic has recently been on-device multilingual ASR system. I received my M.S in Electrical Engineering from KAIST in IIDS, and my B.S. in Electrical Engineering from KAIST. I am interested in speech recognition and speech translation system. Currently, I am widening my interest to combining speech model with techniques from various fields, such as multimodal generative AI.

Below shows my publications, career and projects. Please refer to my [CV] for further details.


Publication

A More Accurate Internal Language Model Score Estimation for the Hybrid Autoregressive Transducer
Kyungmin Lee*, Haeri Kim*, Sichen Jin, Jinhwan Park, Youngho Han
In Proc. Interspeech, 2023

Self-diagnosing gan: Diagnosing underrepresented samples in generative adversarial networks
Jinhee Lee*, Haeri Kim*, Youngkyu Hong*, Hye Won Chung
Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems, 2021
